job.title: Data Scientist - Python/Machine Learning
job.description: <strong>Work with the best in the industry on underwater vehicles!<br><br></strong>This Jobot Job is hosted by Tori Bender<br><br>Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.<br><br><strong>A Bit About Us<br><br></strong>Our client is changing the world through the development of ocean-based vehicles. They are transforming the way ocean data is collected and distributed worldwide, allowing scientists, engineers, and governments access to insights that were previously unobtainable.<br><br>You’ll be a part of a team taking on earth’s last frontier!<br><br><strong><br><br><strong>Why join us?<br><br></strong></strong><ul><li>100% of benefits are covered for employees. </li><li>Equity<br></li></ul><strong>Job Details<br><br></strong>Your role<br><ul><li> Build Machine Learning models for various data sets</li><li> Design and implement reports and quality visualizations of accuracy</li><li> Produce documentation and presentations </li><li> Work alongside other engineers to build an end-to-end data processing pipeline<br></li></ul><strong>Skills Required<br></strong><ul><li> Proficiency in various machine learning models (SVM, KNN, and CNN)</li><li> Detailed understanding of Python and associated learning libraries</li><li> Knowledge and use of databases</li><li> Experience with producing real-world ML results<br></li></ul>What we’d like to see<br><ul><li> Show us evidence of your exceptional ability. Go ahead, brag!</li><li> Industry Experience in Machine learning</li><li> Independent project that demonstrates software proficiencies<br></li></ul>Nice to have<br><ul><li> Master's Degree, or equivalent experience, in a STEM field<br></li></ul>ITAR Requirements<br><br>To conform to U.S. Government space technology export regulations, the applicant must be a U.S. citizen, lawful permanent resident of the U.S., protected individual as defined by ITAR (22 CFR<br><ul><li>120.15) or eligible to obtain the required authorizations from the U.S. Department of State.<br></li></ul>Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.<br><br>
